sql.where: AND F_NAMEID LIKE '%${nameID}%' AND F_DEPARTMENTID LIKE '%${departmentID}%' AND F_PROJECT_LEADERID LIKE '%${Project_leaderID}%' AND F_DEPUTY_MANAGERID LIKE '%${deputy_managerID}%' AND F_NAME LIKE '%${name}%' AND F_DATE =#{date} AND F_DATE >=#{begindate,jdbcType=DATE} AND F_DATE <=#{enddate,jdbcType=DATE} AND F_DEPARTMENT LIKE '%${department}%' AND F_PROJECT_NAME LIKE '%${project_name}%' AND F_N_NAME LIKE '%${n_name}%' AND F_CONTENT LIKE '%${content}%' AND F_NOTE LIKE '%${note}%' AND F_ENCLOSURE LIKE '%${enclosure}%' AND F_PROJECT_LEADER LIKE '%${Project_leader}%' AND F_DEPUTY_MANAGER LIKE '%${deputy_manager}%' AND F_PROJECTTASKID LIKE '%${projectTaskId}%' and finish = 1

mapper.update: UPDATE W_HJ_REGULATORY_SCHEME SET F_NAMEID=#{nameID,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, F_DEPARTMENTID=#{departmentID,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, F_PROJECT_LEADERID=#{Project_leaderID,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, F_DEPUTY_MANAGERID=#{deputy_managerID,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, F_NAME=#{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, F_DATE=#{date,jdbcType=DATE}, F_DEPARTMENT=#{department,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, F_PROJECT_NAME=#{project_name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, F_N_NAME=#{n_name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, F_CONTENT=#{content,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, F_NOTE=#{note,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, F_ENCLOSURE=#{enclosure,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, F_PROJECT_LEADER=#{Project_leader,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, F_DEPUTY_MANAGER=#{deputy_manager,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, F_PROJECTTASKID=#{projectTaskId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} WHERE ID=#{id}
mapper.select: SELECT ,B.runId FROM W_HJ_REGULATORY_SCHEME A,BPM_PRO_RUN B WHERE A.ID=B.BUSINESSKEY_NUM AND B.STATUS=4 and B.CREATORID=#{userId} order by B.CREATETIME DESC
SELECT ,B.runId FROM W_HJ_REGULATORY_SCHEME A,BPM_PRO_RUN_HIS B WHERE A.ID=B.BUSINESSKEY_NUM and B.CREATORID=#{userId} and B.STATUS=2 order by B.ENDTIME DESC
